body_html:
not working for me at the moment. See here

It is a bit confusing to build the target libtensorflow_cc.so on a windows machine. (shared object on windows?!?! CMake is much more accurate and clearer in this case, but unfortunatly you dropped the CMake support in 1.10)

body:
not working for me at the moment. See [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/21880#issuecomment-420782866)

It is a bit confusing to build the target **libtensorflow_cc.so** on a windows machine. (shared object on windows?!?! CMake is much more accurate and clearer in this case, but unfortunatly you dropped the CMake support in 1.10)
